A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just as Empire was poorly received and rose from the ashes\, so will The Last Jedi.  A fresh take on Star Wars that isn't afraid to take risks\, expand on characters and delivers some solid action.  The twists feel more natural and make more sense upon repeat viewings.  No film is perfect (One story line in particular makes the story drag a bit) but overall an impressive filming achievement that challenges our understanding of  the Force and the Star Wars universe.  Gets better with every repeat viewing.
